songs.title: Courtroom - Intro
songs.lyrics:
Order in the court, order in the court
Councillor control your client please
Mr. Robert Ross, one more outburst like this
And I'll see to it that
No one leaves this court room for the next 30 days
Now, will the prosecution please play the video tape?

And I say, why, why can't still
I'ma clean my [Incomprehensible] out, right now, pardon me
Fuck you, [Incomprehensible]
